'Intense' is the fifth studio album by Dutch trance producer and DJ Armin van
Buuren. It is to be released on the 3 rd of May, 2013. http://www.arminvanbuuren.com/news/2013/02/armin-announces-5th-
artist-album-intense/

The first single, Waiting for the Night, featuring the singer Fiora, was
released on January 21, 2013. http://www.beatport.com/release/waiting-for-the-
night/1025773
